Ajuda.descricao: Information about the project and its features

sobre_sistema.descricao: This is a secure multitenant system developed with modern technologies. The system implements data isolation between tenants, role-based access control (RBAC), JWT authentication, and various other security features.

funcionalidades.autenticacao: JWT Authentication with Bcrypt for password hashing

seguranca.descricao: The system implements various security mechanisms to protect data and ensure system integrity:
seguranca.jwt: JWT tokens with expiration and automatic refresh
seguranca.cors: CORS configuration for protection against malicious requests
